item.quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, but the size of the fight in the dog
item.author: Archie Griffen

item.quote: Nothing lasts forever. Not even your troubles
item.author: Arnold H Glasgow

item.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle
item.author: Albert Einstein

item.quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave
item.author: Mary Tyler Moore

item.quote: Being strong means rejoicing in who you are, complete with imperfections
item.author: Margaret Woodhouse

item.quote: If you don’t go after what you want, you’ll never have it. If you don’t ask, the answer is always no. If you don’t step forward, you’re always in the same place
item.author: Nora Roberts

item.quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed
item.author: Michael Jordan

item.quote: The only place you find success before work is in the dictionary
item.author: May V. Smith

item.quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your consent
item.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

item.quote: It took me a long time not to judge myself through someone else's eyes
item.author: Sally Field

item.quote: I quit being afraid when my first venture failed and the sky didn't fall down
item.author: Allen H. Neuharth

item.quote: Hope never abandons you, you abandon it
item.author: George Weinberg

item.quote: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you
item.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.quote: Awards become corroded, friends gather no dust
item.author: Jesse Owens

item.quote: People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in their true beauty is revealed only if there is light from within
item.author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

item.quote: Nothing splendid has ever been achieved except by those who dared believe that something inside of them was superior to circumstance
item.author: Bruce Barton

item.quote: Life is 10% of what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
item.author: John Maxwell

item.quote: Aerodynamically the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know that so it goes on flying anyway
item.author: Mary Kay Ash
